lyrics:
13 contributorslet the sparks fly lyricsintro
hahaha

hook

burn it like its fading
no more hesitating
let the sparks fly baby

verse i
give me one if its real

it only takes one spark

and three more to blow it away

give me three signs that youre awake

theres nowhere to hide
theres nothing but darkness left here
shake it off and lets take a ride
cause heavens not far away
and im not gonna leave you here
